title: [PROMPT] Improve tool definitions to prevent model hallucinations

logs.msg: Unknown tool call (find_files_matching_pattern) appears model-side; not a core tool bug. Consider aliasing to glob if desired.

Reverted tool name aliasing per user feedback. We should NOT silently alias tool names - if the model hallucinates, that's a bug to fix at the prompt/tool definition level, not mask with aliasing. Only stripping embedded args and XML artifacts is appropriate.
Not aliasing - this is a model/prompt issue to fix. If model hallucinates tool names, it should get an error and the system prompt or tool definitions should be improved.
